title: Least likely to promote economic growth

content.question: Which of the following is LEAST likely to promote economic growth?

choices.label: Increase in consumption of nondurable goods
Increase in the labor force participation rate

content.answer: Increase in consumption of nondurable goods

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
